SEARCH
Package am.aua.npuzzle.core

Class ArrayTiles

java.lang.Object
am.aua.npuzzle.core.Tiles
am.aua.npuzzle.core.ArrayTiles
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class ArrayTiles extends Tiles implements Cloneable
The ArrayTiles class represents the 15-puzzle game board in array form. It provides methods to initialize the game state.

  • Constructor Details

    • ArrayTiles

      public ArrayTiles(String format)
      Constructor of ArrayTiles from an input string. The input must be in the form: "15 2 1 12 : 8 5 6 11 : 4 9 10 7 : 3 14 13 0".
      Parameters:
      format - The string representing the initial state of the puzzle.

    • ArrayTiles

      public ArrayTiles(ArrayTiles that)

      Parameters:
